@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.list.Column
sname
Column
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3
sextends
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.list.Column/@25189
sname
align
stype
string
sgroup
Column
sdescription
Set the CSS text-align property of the column. Defaults to <tt>'left'</tt>.
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute

sname
cls
stype
string
sgroup
Column
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
Optional. This option can be used to add a CSS class to the cell of each
row for this column.
#$@text#$@
